name: Summer Athletics Games Sports
description:
We welcome you to “Summer Athletics Games Sports”, Do you love to play indoor and outdoor Sports games? Come with us have a perfect experience in this sports simulator. Summer sport simulator allows you to play athletics, Skateboarding, Drum Run, Dart shooting, mini car racing, Frisbee, swimming events and many more, all in sharp 3D graphics.
• Smooth controls for skateboard in this nice playful world
• Amazing virtual stadium for Basketball
• Play undefeated 3D kart Racing mini games
• Love physical activities, Go for hurdle race, jump and jump
• Run Run in a Rally race from point to point
• Play horse riding in vastly huge summer sports event
